extendedInfo.description: Do you have the spatial awareness and dexterity of a lump of cheese? Or are you the hottest driver since the invention of the wheel? â Nowâs your chance to prove it, in the most skillful and addictive driving and parking game out there.Parking Mania captures that great, âeasy to learn, hard to masterâ style of gameplay that will keep you coming back for more. With hidden areas and pick-ups, time-based bonuses and a driving experience that ranges from exhilaratingly smooth to devilishly tricky, thereâs always more to explore, and higher speeds to hit! With over 80 vehicles ranging from sports cars to big-rigs, playable in varied, multi-objective levels, across night and day, and traveling from parking lots through city streets and highways â all with random AI-controlled traffic â Parking Maniaâs huge variety of gameplay will give you hours upon hours of entertainment.

reviews.title: Fun  but hard at the same time but i love it!
reviews.comment: This is a great game for anyone who whats to playy a fun but hard ggame and on top of that it  never  ggets boreing like most games i playy on my phone its a fun game for every one
reviews.author: Jonathan Gough

reviews.title: Recommend This Game!!!
reviews.comment: This is addicting and fun. It is great time killer. I recommend it. Trust me you will like it! :) :)
reviews.author: Karina Sumner

reviews.title: Cool awesome addicting fun
reviews.comment: Awesome game and challenging
reviews.author: Azra Khanim

reviews.title: Love the game but
reviews.comment: I loved playing this game on my iPod, but now playing it on my android Samsung Galaxy S3 the app closes by itself when I try to click on a level to play! What\'s going on?! Please fix this so I can play it!
reviews.author: Zanaijah Ahmira

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: Downloaded this game last night. It is extremely fun, but now I can\'t even get passed the start screen before it crashes! Please fix this and my rating will change.
reviews.author: Brianna Hearn

reviews.title: Galaxy Note II
reviews.comment: The gameplay is not smooth and the wheel gets stuck and it does not register most of the time. The controls need some work. Otherwise, its a good game.
reviews.author: Renzo Fernandez

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I really like this game on my ipod but it won\'t let me play it on my lg optimus zip phone. Please fix
reviews.author: Erin Freeman

reviews.title: Freezes!
reviews.comment: This is such an addicting game! One of my favorites ever. THREE times just today i have had to restart my phone because it froze while changing levels. Fix this and i would give it a 10 if i could!!!
reviews.author: thomas walker

reviews.title: Glitches
reviews.comment: I was anticipating it since i used to play it on my iPod. Everything works as it should. Level 48 causes the game to crash when reverse parking the very first boat.
reviews.author: Leo Alexandrov

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Only thing that sucks is the ads. But u can easily close them out. I love the how the difficulty level continues to get harder. Very fun and challenging
reviews.author: Latricia Covington

reviews.title: Good game, needs work
reviews.comment: The game is amazing, never would have expected it on the market, but it has its downs. The controls need work and the wheel somethimes has a spaz attack and I crash into something, when I am turning the wheel regesters it as I dontbhave my finger on it. But great game other than that.
reviews.author: David Gore

reviews.title: Almost five
reviews.comment: Awesome free game smooth gameplay. Great simulated traffic...only bad thing is the stupid netflix ad that crashes the game...I dont mind ads in free games really but when it freezes the game its annoying as hell.
reviews.author: Jeff Schmidt

reviews.title: Closing
reviews.comment: I Play Maybe 1 or 2 Levels and An Add Pops Up And You Cant Get Out And It Sends You To Your Home Screen And Have To Go Thru Da Loading Process AGAIN !! I HATE IT
reviews.author: Jamie TewCutee

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Sucks.Started out as something to pass the time now all it does is freezes after I ppaid to not have ads run every 5seconds
reviews.author: William Cash

reviews.title: Great game. Needs update.
reviews.comment: This game is awsome! But sometimes turns off by itself. Kicks me out after level 47...
reviews.author: Danny Morales

reviews.title: Needs improvements
reviews.comment: It takes way to long to start up first of all. And it makes my fone slower, cause when i try to exit the game when i see the sponsors name for 5minutes IT DOSENT WORK. And the lagging. It tells you your new objective after u pull off. And why does the game have to take a mini pause to aay the objective? it no point of wasting 30+ MB for crap. the game is a great addicting game.  But it really needs to be fixes
reviews.author: Sosa Baby

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: It lets me play an level then after that level is done its an ad then i can play the next game then has another ad then i press my back button and it stop working altogether THE CREATORS HAVE TO FIX THIS PROBLEM
reviews.author: Aricah Wheat

reviews.title: Crashing problems!
reviews.comment: I have a HTC evo lte, when I\'m playing this game and happen to get a text message(I use the soon handcent SMS) it freezes up my phone, and I\'m forced to do a hard reboot. Will give 5 stars if this is fixed!
reviews.author: Tim Weston

reviews.title: Greater
reviews.comment: I liked it. I don\'t care about: y the pop ups but can u fix it. Ur still my favorite :-) :-D
reviews.author: patricia jiles

reviews.title: Game is great
reviews.comment: Awsome game but sometimes the gas sticks and and doesn\'t want to turn like it should. I highly reccomend a update that will fix everything
reviews.author: Brandon Hughes
